*TEST sort (lagrit_input_sort)
read  gmv input_sort.gmv mesh1
*
sort / xyz  / bins                                                                      
cmo/printatt/mesh1/i_index//
cmo/printatt/mesh1/j_index//
*
sort / xyz  / index                                                                      
cmo/printatt/mesh1/i_index//
cmo/printatt/mesh1/j_index//
*
sort / xyz  / rank                                                                      
cmo/printatt/mesh1/i_index//
cmo/printatt/mesh1/j_index//
*
* begin compare here
cmo/status
cmo/printatt//-all-/minmax
quality
finish
